Initialises this \hyperlink{classchaos_1_1test_1_1_test_logger}{Test\-Logger} instance. 

This function should only be called once, before an other calls to the logger are made.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em output} & The output file to write test logs to. If output is set to \char`\"{}stdout\char`\"{} the logger will write to std\-::cout rather than to disk. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
